channel.title: Fall '23 Week 4 :: CC 410 Textbook
channel.description: Resources Slides Edited Transcript Hello, and welcome to the week for announcements video for CC410 in fall 2023. This week you should be wrapping up the second restaurant milestone, which is all on documentation testing in UML. You’ll be adding documentation and testing to your code, so this is a lot of code to add to the restaurant project, and it’s really the first time you get to work with unit tests.
